mainText:
Dear Family and Friends,

Let me express my sincere condolence for the departure of our dear Steve
Jobs (1955).

May the Lord grant you peace as you journey home to Him in heaven, for you
to continue your good work up in heaven. We will miss you here on earth but
your legacy, the products you left behind for us carries your name for ever.
header: Steve Jobs, Rest in Peace in the Lord
author: Anonymous
